participant_1.background: my family has raised horses for a generations. i want to be a lawyer. i was raised on a horse farm. i'm from a small town. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.background: my parents were also teachers. i'm an elementary school teacher. i love to play board games. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

content.text: Hey! Are you from a small town? Because I am.
Sorry this is as clear as mud to me.
You know, Justin beer is highly underrated as a musician.
